attributes.action: consider RENATIONALISATION of the public transport system of england scotland and wales
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
we believe the public transport system of this country would be better placed to help the reduction of carbon emmisions if All control was centralised.
Whilst aknowledging that privatisation of some sections of transport has helped over the past years we feel that to meet the future needs of the public futher cooperation between the different forms of transport is imperitive and we feel this could best be done within the public rather than the private sector.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
